Subject: Support for Configuring Email Domain Whitelists and Denylists
Description: Dear support team, I have a case regarding setting up an allow and deny list for controlling email sending. Here are the details of the problem: First and foremost, I have created a deny list that blocks users from sending emails to the Gmail domain, so I defined the deny list as "gmail.com." It worked as expected. Second, I created a policy that contains an allow list for excluding specific users from sending emails to the Gmail domain, for example, "phuongnguyen@gmail.com." But when I tested it, it was blocked as well. Could you help me fix this? I would appreciate it if you could give me a detailed guide for the correct setup. Let me know if you want further information. I am looking forward to hearing from you. Thank you. Phuong
What_We_Know__c:
16-04 Customer encounter an issue with his allowlist of an email domain. 

He would like to send email to specific email addresses that he added in the allowlist.
He also have a email domain denylist who is blocking the same domain.

The use EPP server 5.9.4.1 and EPP client 6.2.4.2
Next_Steps__c:
16-04 We have requested a few additional details to be able to try to reproduce the scenario on our end.

17-04 We will schedule a remote session to assist the customer with the situation that he is encountering with the allowlist.

23-04 We have scheduled the meeting for Friday to check the issue encountered.
24-04 Customer cannot attend the meeting we have to schedule it for the next week.
28-04 Made a follow up to check their availability.
